4306400.name: Hellish Scrub
4306400.description:
You’re a janitor trapped in Hell. The only way out? Clean it.

Hellish Scrub is a 2D top-down action-adventure where cleaning is combat and filth fights back. After falling through a pit in a disgusting bathroom stall, you’re dropped into a neglected underworld ruled by a depressed Devil who’s given up on the mess.

Scrub through demon-infested rooms, battle enemies that really like things filthy, and clean your way toward escape. If the Devil is impressed enough by your work, he might just let you return to your body on Earth.

After all… even Hell has standards.
4306400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
